content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One of the Management functions is motivation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Motivation is the process of encouraging the staff to perform efficiently through forming behavior motives for achieving employees' goals for the benefit of the organization.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"line-height\":\"1.42857\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We explored this from two different perspectives:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":677596,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a16f8b6-5429-4d57-abe2-abde389329b2/image2019-4-2_11-35-1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a16f8b6-5429-4d57-abe2-abde389329b2/image2019-4-2_11-35-1.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"image2019-4-2_11-35-1.png\",\"name\":\"image2019-4-2_11-35-1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1a16f8b6-5429-4d57-abe2-abde389329b2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":821,\"height\":452},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The organization provides the structure and processes – performance management and reward schemes, compensation packages, training, mentoring, coaching, interesting work, challenging project and innovative technologies albeit structures and processes themselves do not motivate employees.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Studies have shown that \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"intrinsic motivators are much more powerful than extrinsic motivators\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some modern researchers know that there are \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"five specific intrinsic motivators\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" that have the most impact. These intrinsic motivators\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" are:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":70024,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6b896277-a80c-4e65-adff-83ae558a603b/image2019-4-2_11-35-32.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6b896277-a80c-4e65-adff-83ae558a603b/image2019-4-2_11-35-32.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"image2019-4-2_11-35-32.png\",\"name\":\"image2019-4-2_11-35-32.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6b896277-a80c-4e65-adff-83ae558a603b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":805,\"height\":375.00000000000006},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Motivation Profiles can help you to work with your particular employee in the most efficient way. Knowing the main employee's motivators will help you to create achievable PDP, retain employees, recognize and reward employee's successes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every team member has one's own motivators, which are different from other ones\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Motivators can change over life and career development, under the influence of external factors and in connection with personality development and changes\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"line-height\":\"1.42857\"}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Take into account not one single motivator, but several factors used together and prioritized\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"line-height\":\"1.42857\"}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Many managers attribute their own motivators to the employees\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"line-height\":\"1.42857\"}}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Action item: create motivation profiles for all your team members using 1-on-1 and any other available sources. Ask People Management Team for help.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"RETENTION. Why Does It Matter?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee retention is the effort made by employers to ensure that their existing employees remain with them, and discourage them from seeking prospects elsewhere.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Manager's RETENTION
